text: Leonard 'Len' Walter Carter (born 21 November 1942) is a former British sprinter. ==Athletics career== At the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games he won the gold medal with the England team in the 4 x 110 yards relay. ==References== * Profile at TOPS in athletics Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:English male sprinters Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games gold medallists for England Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1962 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Len Carter
